titleStmt.title: A sermon design'd for the funeral of Ed. Wiseman Esq late of East-Lockinge in the county of Berks. Who was buried at Stevinton near Abingdon November the ninth, 1694. By Will. Sevill, Master of Arts, and Fellow of C.C.C. Oxford. Published at the request of many gentlemen of Berks.
titleStmt.author: Sevill, William, b. 1667 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wilmot, and John Howell booksellers in Oxford,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by the cataloguer.
Imperfect; tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
